title: Ticket #5385: HTCondor View: simplify HTCondorViewLinked
description:
HTCondorViewLinked can be cleaned up. Its guts should be redesigned. Perhaps a single, grand-unified nested object describing all sources/durations, with the matching arguments to pass to HTCondorView? In the process, change the names to match HTCondorView's for simplicity.

Strawman: 

var views = {
"Users/Now": {
	data_url: "submitters.now.json",
	title: "Total Jobs",
	graph_query: "order=JobStatus&group=JobStatus;Count&chart=pie",
	table_query: "order=JobStatus&pivot=Name;JobStatus;Count",
	select_tuple: ["Name"]
	},
"Users/Day": {
	data_url: "submitters.json",
	title: "Total Jobs",
	graph_query: "order=Date&pivot=Date;JobStatus;Count&chart=stacked",
	table_query: "order=Date&pivot=Name;JobStatus;avg(Count)",
	select_tuple: ["Name"],
	},
};

with "/" indicating option 1 and 2. This means that changing the first option will change the choices for the second option. Also, there will be piles of redundancy, although it could be built out of pieces.
remarks:
2015-Dec-23 11:46:19 by adesmet:
Dropping HTCondorViewLinked. The key functionality is in HTCondorViewRanged, which is better behaved.
